summary: E-commerce website for selling products online

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog page that displays all available products with images, names, descriptions, and prices
Implement a shopping cart system where users can add products, view cart contents, and update quantities
Create a checkout flow that collects customer information and processes orders
Build an admin interface to manage products (add, edit, delete) and view orders
Implement Internet Identity authentication to restrict admin access
Design a professional, cohesive visual theme with warm earth tones, clean typography, and spacious layouts that create a trustworthy shopping experience

Add an informational section to the admin products page explaining how to upload products, including: clicking the 'Add Product' button, filling in the product form with name/description/price, selecting an image file (max 5MB), and clicking 'Add Product' to save

new_feature_requests.summary: Create e-commerce website with product catalog and online sales capability
